meanings.definition: A person who complies with rules or requests.
meanings.sent1: The compliers in the group always follow the teacher's instructions.
meanings.sent2: The new employee is a diligent complier with company policies.
meanings.sent3: The compliers at the party made sure to clean up after themselves.
meanings.sent4: She was the ultimate complier, never breaking a single rule.
meanings.sent5: The compliers in the community set a great example for others to follow.

meanings.definition: A software program that translates source code into machine code.
meanings.sent1: The compliers used in the project helped convert the code efficiently.
meanings.sent2: Programmers rely on compliers to compile their code into executable files.
meanings.sent3: The compliers worked tirelessly to turn the complex code into a functional program.
meanings.sent4: The compliers acted like translators, turning the code into a language the computer could understand.
meanings.sent5: The compliers played a crucial role in the development process, ensuring smooth execution of the software.
